ix.iface.ui
Interface FramePanel

All Known Subinterfaces:
ConstructFraming
All Known Implementing Classes:
AConstructFramePanel, ActionEditorPanel, AROEditorPanel, GlobalFramePanel, GrammarEditorPanel, SimpleEditorPanel
public interface FramePanel

An interface implemented by all panels that may handle events generated in their parent frames.

Method Summary
 boolean frameActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)
          Should recognise panel specific events and processes them.
 

Method Detail

frameActionPerformed

boolean frameActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent event)
Should recognise panel specific events and processes them. This is a separate method from the normal actionPerformed because it is called by other event handlers and must let them know whether it recognised the event.

Parameters:
event - the event to be processed.
Returns:
true if the event was recognised, false if not.
